name: Ice Age: World
description: Craft a unique farm among eternal ice. Grow tasty fruits and vegetables in your gardens, produces various products. Try to survive ice age merrily together with cute characters of this Android game. Gather a team of numerous funny animals on your farm. Grow pineapples, water-melons, bananas and other fruits. Build various constructions and expand your farm. Explore new territories looking for the new places for gardens. Avoid giant meteorites. Sell tasty products.
